Reason: The configuration option OPTIMIZE_INSERT_FROM_SELECT in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly impacts the execution time and memory consumption of the system. When set to optimize insert from select, the system may experience improved performance by optimizing the insert operation when selecting data from another table. However, if this configuration is not properly tuned, it can lead to increased resource usage and slower execution times, making it a critical factor in system performance.
